intro: This document serves as the Product Specification and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product for the reference year 2021. As the first component of the CLC+ Product Suite, the Backbone represents a significant advancement in European land cover/land use monitoring, expanding upon the CORINE Land Cover (CLC) legacy. The manual provides detailed specifications of the 10m resolution, pixel-based raster product, including production methodologies, data quality assessments, and guidelines for access and utilisation across the EEA-38, aiming to equip users with comprehensive information for advanced analyses and diverse applications.
